query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LOG:ID:LOGID@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LOG:HOST_NAME:HOST_NAME@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LOG:ACTION_METHOD:ACTION_METHOD@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LOG:START_TIME:START_TIME@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LOG:FINISH_TIME:FINISH_TIME@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LOG:URL_ACTION:URL_ACTION@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LOG:SESSION_COOKIE:SESSION_COOKIE@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:ELAPSED_SECS:ELAPSED_SECS@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LOG:USER_NAME:USER_NAME@ FROM (SELECT Z.ID, Z.HOST_NAME, Z.ACTION_METHOD, Z.START_TIME - LOG_TIMEZONE_DIFF_FCT(@WHERE:PARAM:USER_ID@)/24 START_TIME, Z.FINISH_TIME - LOG_TIMEZONE_DIFF_FCT(@WHERE:PARAM:USER_ID@)/24 FINISH_TIME, Z.URL_SHORT URL_ACTION, substr(Z.session_cookie,-16) SESSION_COOKIE, round(Z.elapsed_time/1000,1) ELAPSED_SECS, NVL(U.USER_NAME, 'UNKNOWN') USER_NAME FROM LOG_DETAILS Z LEFT OUTER JOIN LOG_SESSIONS S ON (Z.SESSION_COOKIE = S.TOKEN) LEFT OUTER JOIN CMN_SEC_USERS U ON (S.USER_ID = U.ID) WHERE Z.LOG_DATE=TRUNC(@WHERE:PARAM:XML:DATE:/data/log_hour/@value@) AND URL_ACTION NOT IN ('/niku/xog','/niku/soap') AND Z.HOST_NAME=@WHERE:PARAM:XML:STRING:/data/hostname/@value@ AND Z.FINISH_TIME BETWEEN @WHERE:PARAM:XML:DATE:/data/log_hour/@value@ AND @WHERE:PARAM:XML:DATE:/data/log_hour/@value@ + 1/24 ) WHERE @FILTER@
